lead_paragraph: Two Mongolian wrestling coaches who stripped off in protest at the judging at last month's Rio Olympics have been suspended for three years, the sport's international federation said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Mongolian Coaches Banned for Three Years for Rio Strip
headline.main: Mongolian Coaches Banned for Three Years for Rio Strip
